name: Brinkwood Codex
description:
Brinkwood: The Blood of Tyrants is a Forged in the Dark tabletop roleplaying game about building a rebellion that will overthrow the blood-soaked vampires that oppress and dominate your world.

This codex is an expansion on the base game "Brinkwood: The Blood of Tyrants" and includes additional rules, settings, and lore to enrich and expand your Brinkwood campaign.

Inside You'll Find:

  • Expanded rules on how to handle ambush tactics, decadent soirees, and the workings of ancient magic.
  • Optional adventures and forays from abandoned mines to grand feasts.
  • Fiction, essays, and short stories from some of the top authors of the ttrpg scene
  • Alternate world settings ranging from colonial Mexico to 1980's northern England to the cyberpunk era of Brinkwood 2099
